text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('DATA_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')

ScriptCount.value:
@concat('SELECT COUNT(T.LINE) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT CONCAT(
''02|'',TEMP.PHX_ROW_ID
,''|'',TEMP.EXISTING_ROW_ID
,''|'',TEMP.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM
,''|'',TEMP.LIMIT_MNY
,''|'',TEMP.THRESHOLD_ID
,''|'',TEMP.REQUEST_ID
,''|'',TEMP.ACTION_TYPE
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.ACTION_DTM)
,''|'',TEMP.REASON_CODE
,''|'',TEMP.REASON_SUBCODE
,''|'',TEMP.ASSIGN_NO
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT)
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.CREATED)
,''|'',TEMP.CREATED_BY
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
,''|'',TEMP.LAST_UPD_BY
,''|'',TEMP.SEQ_NO
,''|'',TEMP.CREDIT_GRADE
,''|'',TEMP.ARPU
,''|'',TEMP.MIN_REVIEW
,''|'',TEMP.SUM_MAIN
,''|'',TEMP.NEXT_BILL_DATE
,''|'',TEMP.PHX_OPERATION
) AS LINE FROM (
SELECT ROW_ID AS PHX_ROW_ID,REF_ROW_ID AS EXISTING_ROW_ID,BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,
LIMIT_MNY ,THRESHOLD_ID ,REQUEST_ID ,ACTION_TYPE ,ACTION_DTM ,REASON_CODE ,REASON_SUBCODE ,
ASSIGN_NO ,TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,CREATED ,CREATED_BY ,LAST_UPD ,LAST_UPD_BY ,SEQ_NO ,
CREDIT_GRADE ,ARPU ,MIN_REVIEW ,SUM_MAIN ,NEXT_BILL_DATE ,''Insert'' AS PHX_OPERATION
FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, CREATED) < CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
UNION ALL
SELECT ASSIGN_ROW_ID AS PHX_ROW_ID,ASSIGN_REF_ROW_ID AS EXISTING_ROW_ID,BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,
LIMIT_MNY ,THRESHOLD_ID ,REQUEST_ID ,ACTION_TYPE ,ACTION_DTM ,REASON_CODE ,REASON_SUBCODE ,
ASSIGN_NO ,TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,CREATED ,CREATED_BY ,LAST_UPD ,LAST_UPD_BY ,SEQ_NO ,
CREDIT_GRADE ,ARPU ,MIN_REVIEW ,SUM_MAIN ,NEXT_BILL_DATE ,''Delete'' AS PHX_OPERATION
FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN_AT 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, BATCH_CREATED) < CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
)TEMP) T;')

parameters.messageWhenCountZero: Query return credit assign data not found

	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))

	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))

ScriptCount.value:
@concat('SELECT COUNT(T.LINE) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT CONCAT(
''02|'',TEMP.ACCNT_ID
,''|'',TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID
,''|'',TEMP.CREDIT_GRADE
,''|'',TEMP.ARPU
,''|'',TEMP.SCORE_RANGE
,''|'',TEMP.CREDIT_LIMIT
,''|'',TEMP.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT
,''|'',TEMP.PREV_SCORE_RANGE
,''|'',TEMP.PREV_GNV_THESHOLD_SET_ID
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.LAST_REVIEW_DAT)
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
,''|'',TEMP.LAST_UPD_BY
,''|'',TEMP.CL_TYPE
,''|'',TEMP.CL_CHANGE_REASON
,''|'',TEMP.OUTCOME_REASON
,''|'',TEMP.MIN_REVIEW
,''|'',TEMP.FBB_FLAG
,''|'',TEMP.ACTUAL
,''|'',TEMP.PREVIUS_ACTUAL
,''|'',TEMP.SUM_PRO
,''|'',TEMP.CREDIT_LIMIT_ROW_ID
,''|'',TEMP.TOTAL_SCORE
,''|'',TEMP.PROFILE_COMPLETE_FLG
) AS LINE FROM (
SELECT ACCNT_ID,BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,CREDIT_GRADE ,ARPU ,SCORE_RANGE ,CREDIT_LIMIT ,PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
PREV_SCORE_RANGE ,'''' AS PREV_GNV_THESHOLD_SET_ID,LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,LAST_UPD ,LAST_UPD_BY ,CL_TYPE,
CL_CHANGE_REASON ,OUTCOME_REASON ,MIN_REVIEW ,FBB_FLAG ,ACTUAL ,'''' AS PREVIUS_ACTUAL,SUM_MAIN_PRO AS SUM_PRO,
'''' AS CREDIT_LIMIT_ROW_ID,'''' AS TOTAL_SCORE,PROFILE_COMPLETE_FLG 
FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_REQUEST
WHERE CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND CONVERT(Date, CREATED) < CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
)TEMP) T;')

ScriptCount.value:
@concat('SELECT COUNT(T.LINE) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT ''02|''+COALESCE(TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID+''|''+TEMP.ACCNT_NO,TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID+''|'',''|''+TEMP.ACCNT_NO) AS LINE
FROM (SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT IS NULL  
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 	     
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
	((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
	  + 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  <=  ( SELECT top 1 CAST(lov_val1 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CFG_LOV c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_CUSTOMER_NEW_OLD'' and lov_name = ''Existing'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )      
  AND ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE()+1) As Date) )
	  ) 
UNION ALL	  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg =''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )   
  AND  ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, (SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), B.BA_REGISTER_DT) As Date) )
	) 
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE())+1 As Date)  
UNION ALL  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,B.ACCNT_NO
FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
INNER JOIN ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN C ON C.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM = B.ACCNT_NO AND C.REASON_SUBCODE IN(''1863'',''1864'') AND C.ACTION_DTM < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
)TEMP
GROUP BY TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO) T;')

	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))

ScriptCount.value:
@concat('SELECT COUNT(T.LINE) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT ''02|''+ CONCAT(ROW_ID ,''|'',CREATED ,''|'',CREATED_BY ,''|'',LAST_UPD,''|'',LAST_UPD_BY 
				,''|'',ACCNT_NO ,''|'',ACCNT_CATEGORY ,''|'',ACCNT_SUB_CATEGORY ,''|'',BILL_NAME ,''|'',BILL_CYCLE 
				,''|'',INVOICING_COMPANY ,''|'',PAYMENT_METHOD ,''|'',MASTER_ACCNT_ID ,''|'',STATUS_CD 
				,''|'',BILLING_STATUS_CD ,''|'',REGISTER_DT ,''|'',ARPU ,''|'',CREDIT_GRADE ,''|'',DEBT_NEGO_FLG 
				,''|'',PAYMENT_FLAG) as LINE FROM CREDIT.TEST_CC_BILLING tcb ) T;')
